name: thankshubble
description: celebrating website for the 25th anniversary of Hubble Telescope deployment

scripts.dev: nodemon --verbose --watch src/ --ignore build/ --exec "npm run launch" -e "js html json"
scripts.build:backend: copy /y src\main.js build\main.js /y && copy /y src\arxiv_api.js build\arxiv_api.js
scripts.build:par: parallelshell "npm run build:html" "npm run build:backend" "npm run build:client"
scripts.build:seq: npm run build:html && npm run build:backend && npm run build:client

author: Matteo Capucci <mattecapu@live.it>
